## TranslationDetails.completedTranslationInfo property

The `TranslationJobInfo`<!-- -->s containing information about the last completed translation with this Item as the target Item; null if no translation has been completed with this Item as a target Item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get completedTranslationInfo(): TranslationJobInfo | undefined;
```
